nextgen.core.model.score
Interface WindowScore

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractListScore, CountScore, CoverageScore, LengthScore, NewRatioScore, RatioScore, ScanStatisticScore, SkellamScore, SumScore, WindowAllScore, WindowScore.AbstractWindowScore
public interface WindowScore

Represents a window scoring object. All of the code for calculating scores should be included in implementers of this class
